video_description:
PhoneArena presents an unboxing and hands-on video of the Acer ICONIA TAB A200.

http://www.phonearena.com/news/Acer-ICONIA-TAB-A200-unboxing-and-hands-on_id25994
title: Acer ICONIA TAB A200 unboxing and hands-on

comments.text:
Looks like horrible viewing angles which seems to be typical of acer as of late. Its really a shame that at﻿ $350 you don't get much anymore these days. 
Luckily for me, I've got my trusty galaxy tab 10.1 and my rock solid HP touchpad that was only $99.  Next in line is going to be a 7 to 8.2 inch tablet and a quad core Samsung tablet when they debut. Great video as always, and thank you.

comments.text:
Want a FREE SKINOMI PROTECTOR for this device? (For skeptics: it's not a scam) 
Follow these 5 steps: 
1.)﻿ Look﻿ up "skinomi-forums" on Google, and click the first link that shows up
2.) Sign up for a FREE account
3.) Look under the "other" thread category, and search for the thread that has "[OFFICIAL] Acer Iconia Tab A200 Contest + Skin Design Diagrams " as the header
4.) Read the rules of the contest, and enter the contest!
5.) Follow us @skinomi on twitter and/or "like" us on facebook!
